chara.textHome:
Sometimes, I'm a passionate girl aiming for
a perfect twelve-year attendance award.

Other times, I'm a
Chinese restaurant owner's daughter,
working hard to serve food.
But the real me is actually...
Uwasa Tsuruno, manager of Chelation Land!

C'mon, everyone!
Let's just lie around together!

We haven't opened yet, but the staff is busy
practicing how to greet customers.

I should probably practice too,
but it's a pain so I'll just take a nap.
Now I can scare our bad customers away!

Yeah, I'm getting more used to
being an Uwasa.

This is a great place.
Everyone protects me here, and I don't
have to think hard about stuff.

But if push comes to shove,
I'm the manager so I'll keep
this place safe.

I can sense magic flowing into the
Uwasa from all the visitors.

That must mean I've fused
even more with it, right?
In other words, I myself am Chelation Land.
I won't let anyone deny our existence!
Welcome to Chelation Land!
I'm your ever-present manager, Tsuruno Yui.
Let's just relax together some more today!

We're expecting to be really busy on opening
morning, so we're rehearsing again today.

Though I'm just in the food court
sipping miso soup...

There's a Chelation Land Parade
that happens at noon.

It's a soothing event where all the staff
whoosh your worries away!

Banbanzai tends to get busy
around this time.

Sorry Dad... I wanna help you out,
but I just don't feel like going back.

I never get sleepy,
no matter how late it gets...

I do kinda miss Yachiyo telling me
to hurry up and go to sleep, though...
I hope Chelation Land opens soon...

I'm so excited for everyone to have fun,
relax, and stay here forever!

Seems a Witch showed up outside
Chelation Land.

But hey, I'm not worried, not worried at all!
Some other Magical Girl will come for it.
I'm sure of it.

If you're that worried about the Mirror Witch,
you can go fight it and then come back.

But remember, we're in Chelation Land,
so getting all worked up
goes against the Rumor...

I know this is an amusement park,
but I wish we had stuff to help us relax.

Bean bag chairs, manga,
automatic candy dispensers,
things like that.
Huh? Oh, sorry...
I feel so good I zoned out for a sec.

How do I wanna spend my time,
if I don't have to stress or work hard
at anything?
Huh...

I guess I wish Master and the others
were here so I could be with them.
Ahhh!

How dare you poke someone
napping on a bench?!

Staff! Staff!
There's a troublemaker over here!

As the manager of Chelation Land,
I can tell ALL the staff apart.

Like, see that guy there?
His mustache is a bit lopsided, see?
N-no, don't touch that!

The big Ferris wheel is crammed
full of everyone's worries...
It'd be dangerous to open it!

I could tell as soon as I saw
this amusement park...

Back then, a year ago,
I was completely at peace...

It's important to do great things and wish
for everyone's happiness!

But the most important thing is
your own inner peace!

Being able to just let yourself go like this...
It's the best!
*Snore* *Snore*
Mngh...ahh...
Come in, Master...

I'm the manager, so I'm gonna
protect Chelation Land!
Everyone can exit the venue now!
All you need to do is go with the flow!
Hey, now it's time to chill out!
I can feel safe here.

Being busy, being fidgety,
scampering around, bright and eager...
Which is your favorite?
Mine is "relaxing".

If you're like me,
you should come visit Chelation Land.

I don't really wanna work hard,
but I have to maintain my strength.
I worked too hard!
Time for a break.

Sure, let's talk while we
lounge around over there.

You can't have an amusement park
without a roller coaster.
Oh, and a merry-go-round!
Just having fun isn't enough.

Chelation Land's motto is
"Relax and be lazy,"
so I should also make a spot to sunbathe.
